actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Lorenzo Tobias Pelaez-Ibarra, Francisca Carmona Pelaez, Evencio Alejandro Pelaez-Carmona, Maria Cristina Pelaez-Carmona, Fernando Pelaez-Carmona, and Gerardo Nicolas Pelaez-Carmona.
